name: Hidden Object Mermaid House - Underwater Mystery Hidden Objects Game
name_original: Hidden Object Mermaid House - Underwater Mystery Hidden Objects Game
description:
In the enchanted deep sea, a sea witch Cassandra takes over the castle of the mermaid queen Balaena, out casting her from her own castle and encaging her only daughter Dazzlestar. The sea witch has casted a spell on Dazzlestar to slowly turn her into human and destroyed every path leading back to the castle. Desperate to Rescue her daughter, queen Balaena swims to the nearby village to seek help and finds only 2 children willing to help the queen in this search and find hidden objects game.

Key Features

- Beautiful HD graphics
- Exciting & Intriguing Levels of Hidden Object Puzzles
- Well crafted progressive levels
- Find objects involving more than 10 Levels in underwater hidden object scenes
- Timed limited challenges and hints
